entities.description: The date on which the survey was conducted.
The unweighted frequency of responses for each survey date.
Two-letter state abbreviations used in survey data.
The number of valid cases out of the total cases.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the date it was conducted.
Indicates the unweighted frequency of responses for each date.
Relates the survey to the states using their abbreviations.
Indicates the number of valid cases out of the total cases in the survey.
